about_the_game:
Parry enemy attack!




"Get ready to embark on a challenging journey through a dark and dangerous world in Pixel Kishi! Inspired by Sekiro and Dark Souls, this 2D pixel-art action game requires you to master the art of parrying to defeat your enemies.

Pixel Kishi offers a truly challenging experience, testing even the most skilled gamers with its intense boss battles and intricate combat system. With stunning pixel-art graphics and a unique gameplay loop that rewards careful planning and precise execution, Pixel Kishi is a must-play for fans of the action-adventure genre. "Will you have what it takes to become the ultimate Pixel Kishi warrior?"
